column1: (Note 1) Please ensure access to both production and stage to enter deals, calculate books and set the official flag.
*A unique portfolio/book code will be assigned to your book unless you request a specific portfolio/book code.
BOOK CANNOT BE SET UP IF THERE IS ANY MISSING INFORMATION.
***Please provide login names for book administrators.***
COMMENTS: I selected book codes CI and CH for canada. I do not know if these are available. If not please
pick one code for finacial and one code for physical. Keep consistant between desk as well (Wesk Desk)
